item.description:
This is a new series of Meetups that will focus on the relationship between fashion and music. We will be covering topics which include How fashion and music pros can work together to sell each other's products-How do you figure out which demographic to target in relationship to selling fashion designs/merchandise and music-How do you determine the best designs and music that will work well together to increase sales, customers, and grow a fan base.

In addition, we will be planning a speakers panel for November regarding the relationship between fashion and music and I will be looking for some members that are interested interested in participating in the planning.
item.name: Fashion and Music Collaborative
